Package fr.cotedazur.univ.polytech.citadellesgroupeq.strategies

Class AimForMoneyStrategy

java.lang.Object
fr.cotedazur.univ.polytech.citadellesgroupeq.strategies.DefaultStrategy
fr.cotedazur.univ.polytech.citadellesgroupeq.strategies.AimForMoneyStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStrategy
public class AimForMoneyStrategy extends DefaultStrategy
This strategy: -Tries to pick role Voleur if available -pick coins at start of round (no cards) -Doesn't buy anything.
